And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> in<S>1909</S> the morning<S>4404</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> held<S>4160</S> a consultation<S>4824</S> with<S>3326</S> the elders<S>4245</S> and<S>2532</S> scribes<S>1122</S> and<S>2532</S> the whole<S>3650</S> council<S>4892</S>, and bound<S>1210</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and carried him away<S>667</S>, and<S>2532</S> delivered<S>3860</S> him to Pilate<S>4091</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S>, Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> the King<S>935</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>? And<S>1161</S> he answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> sayest<S>3004</S> it.
And<S>2532</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> accused<S>2723</S> him<S>846</S> of many things<S>4183</S>: but<S>1161</S> he<S>846</S> answered<S>611</S> nothing<S>3762</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Answerest thou<S>611</S> nothing<S>3756</S> <S>3762</S>? behold<S>2396</S> how many things<S>4214</S> they witness<S>2649</S> against thee<S>4675</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> yet<S>3765</S> answered<S>611</S> nothing<S>3762</S>; so<S>5620</S> that Pilate<S>4091</S> marvelled<S>2296</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> at<S>2596</S> that feast<S>1859</S> he released<S>630</S> unto them<S>846</S> one<S>1520</S> prisoner<S>1198</S>, whomsoever<S>3746</S> they desired<S>154</S>.
And<S>1161</S> there was<S>2258</S> one named<S>3004</S> Barabbas<S>912</S>, which lay bound<S>1210</S> with<S>3326</S> them that had made insurrection with him<S>4955</S>, who<S>3748</S> had committed<S>4160</S> murder<S>5408</S> in<S>1722</S> the insurrection<S>4714</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> crying aloud<S>310</S> began<S>756</S> to desire<S>154</S> him to do as<S>2531</S> he had ever<S>104</S> done<S>4160</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Will ye<S>2309</S> that I release<S>630</S> unto you<S>5213</S> the King<S>935</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>?
For<S>1063</S> he knew<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> had delivered<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S> for<S>1223</S> envy<S>5355</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> moved<S>383</S> the people<S>3793</S>, that<S>2443</S> he should rather<S>3123</S> release<S>630</S> Barabbas<S>912</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> again<S>3825</S> unto them<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> will ye<S>2309</S> then<S>3767</S> that I shall do<S>4160</S> unto him whom<S>3739</S> ye call<S>3004</S> the King<S>935</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>?
And<S>1161</S> they cried out<S>2896</S> again<S>3825</S>, Crucify<S>4717</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Why<S>1063</S>, what<S>5101</S> evil<S>2556</S> hath he done<S>4160</S>? And<S>1161</S> they cried out<S>2896</S> the more exceedingly<S>4056</S>, Crucify<S>4717</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> so Pilate<S>4091</S>, willing<S>1014</S> to content<S>2425</S> <S>4160</S> the people<S>3793</S>, released<S>630</S> Barabbas<S>912</S> unto them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> delivered<S>3860</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, when he had scourged<S>5417</S> him, to<S>2443</S> be crucified<S>4717</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the soldiers<S>4757</S> led<S>520</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>520</S> into<S>2080</S> the hall<S>833</S>, called<S>3603</S> Praetorium<S>4232</S>; and<S>2532</S> they call together<S>4779</S> the whole<S>3650</S> band<S>4686</S>. <sup>Praetorium: or, the palace, or, hall of audience</sup>
And<S>2532</S> they clothed<S>1746</S> him<S>846</S> with purple<S>4209</S>, and<S>2532</S> platted<S>4120</S> a crown<S>4735</S> of thorns<S>174</S>, and put it about<S>4060</S> his<S>846</S> head,
And<S>2532</S> began<S>756</S> to salute<S>782</S> him<S>846</S>, Hail<S>5463</S>, King<S>935</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>!
And<S>2532</S> they smote<S>5180</S> him<S>846</S> on the head<S>2776</S> with a reed<S>2563</S>, and<S>2532</S> did spit<S>1716</S> upon him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> bowing<S>5087</S> their knees<S>1119</S> worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> they had mocked<S>1702</S> him<S>846</S>, they took off<S>1562</S> the purple<S>4209</S> from him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> put<S>1746</S> his own<S>2398</S> clothes<S>2440</S> on<S>1746</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> led<S>1806</S> him<S>846</S> out<S>1806</S> to<S>2443</S> crucify<S>4717</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they compel<S>29</S> one<S>5100</S> Simon<S>4613</S> a Cyrenian<S>2956</S>, who passed by<S>3855</S>, coming<S>2064</S> out of<S>575</S> the country<S>68</S>, the father<S>3962</S> of Alexander<S>223</S> and<S>2532</S> Rufus<S>4504</S>, to<S>2443</S> bear<S>142</S> his<S>846</S> cross<S>4716</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they bring<S>5342</S> him<S>846</S> unto<S>1909</S> the place<S>5117</S> Golgotha<S>1115</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S>, being interpreted<S>3177</S>, The place<S>5117</S> of a skull<S>2898</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they gave<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> to drink<S>4095</S> wine<S>3631</S> mingled with myrrh<S>4669</S>: but<S>1161</S> he received<S>2983</S> it not<S>3756</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they had crucified<S>4717</S> him<S>846</S>, they parted<S>1266</S> his<S>846</S> garments<S>2440</S>, casting<S>906</S> lots<S>2819</S> upon<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, what<S>5101</S> every man<S>5101</S> should take<S>142</S>.
And<S>1161</S> it was<S>2258</S> the third<S>5154</S> hour<S>5610</S>, and<S>2532</S> they crucified<S>4717</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the superscription<S>1923</S> of his<S>846</S> accusation<S>156</S> was<S>2258</S> written over<S>1924</S>, THE KING<S>935</S> OF THE JEWS<S>2453</S>.
And<S>2532</S> with<S>4862</S> him<S>846</S> they crucify<S>4717</S> two<S>1417</S> thieves<S>3027</S>; the one<S>1520</S> on<S>1537</S> his right hand<S>1188</S>, and<S>2532</S> the other<S>1520</S> on<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> left<S>2176</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> was fulfilled<S>4137</S>, which<S>3588</S> saith<S>3004</S>, And<S>2532</S> he was numbered<S>3049</S> with<S>3326</S> the transgressors<S>459</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they that passed by<S>3899</S> railed<S>987</S> on him<S>846</S>, wagging<S>2795</S> their<S>846</S> heads<S>2776</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Ah<S>3758</S>, thou that destroyest<S>2647</S> the temple<S>3485</S>, and<S>2532</S> buildest<S>3618</S> it in<S>1722</S> three<S>5140</S> days<S>2250</S>,
Save<S>4982</S> thyself<S>4572</S>, and<S>2532</S> come down<S>2597</S> from<S>575</S> the cross<S>4716</S>.
Likewise<S>1161</S> <S>3668</S> also<S>2532</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> mocking<S>1702</S> said<S>3004</S> among<S>4314</S> themselves<S>240</S> with<S>3326</S> the scribes<S>1122</S>, He saved<S>4982</S> others<S>243</S>; himself<S>1438</S> he cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> save<S>4982</S>.
Let<S>2597</S> Christ<S>5547</S> the King<S>935</S> of Israel<S>2474</S> descend<S>2597</S> now<S>3568</S> from<S>575</S> the cross<S>4716</S>, that<S>2443</S> we may see<S>1492</S> and<S>2532</S> believe<S>4100</S>. And<S>2532</S> they that were crucified<S>4957</S> with him<S>846</S> reviled<S>3679</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>1096</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> hour<S>5610</S> was come<S>1096</S>, there was<S>1096</S> darkness<S>4655</S> over<S>1909</S> the whole<S>3650</S> land<S>1093</S> until<S>2193</S> the ninth<S>1766</S> hour<S>5610</S>.
And<S>2532</S> at the ninth<S>1766</S> hour<S>5610</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> cried<S>994</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Eloi<S>1682</S>, Eloi<S>1682</S>, lama<S>2982</S> sabachthani<S>4518</S>? which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S>, being interpreted<S>3177</S>, My<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, why<S>5101</S> hast<S>1519</S> thou forsaken<S>1459</S> me<S>3165</S>?
And<S>2532</S> some of them<S>5100</S> that stood by<S>3936</S>, when they heard<S>191</S> it, said<S>3004</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, he calleth<S>5455</S> Elias<S>2243</S>.
And<S>1161</S> one<S>1520</S> ran<S>5143</S> and<S>2532</S> filled<S>1072</S> a spunge<S>4699</S> full<S>1072</S> of vinegar<S>3690</S>, and<S>5037</S> put it on<S>4060</S> a reed<S>2563</S>, and gave<S>4222</S> him<S>846</S> to drink<S>4222</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Let alone<S>863</S>; let us see<S>1492</S> whether<S>1487</S> Elias<S>2243</S> will come<S>2064</S> to take<S>2507</S> him<S>846</S> down<S>2507</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> cried<S>863</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, and gave up the ghost<S>1606</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the veil<S>2665</S> of the temple<S>3485</S> was rent<S>4977</S> in<S>1519</S> twain<S>1417</S> from<S>575</S> the top<S>509</S> to<S>2193</S> the bottom<S>2736</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when the centurion<S>2760</S>, which<S>3588</S> stood<S>3936</S> over<S>1537</S> against<S>1727</S> him<S>846</S>, saw<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he so<S>3779</S> cried out<S>2896</S>, and gave up the ghost<S>1606</S>, he said<S>2036</S>, Truly<S>230</S> this<S>3778</S> man<S>444</S> was<S>2258</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
There<S>1161</S> were<S>2258</S> also<S>2532</S> women<S>1135</S> looking<S>2334</S> on afar<S>3113</S> off<S>575</S>: among<S>2532</S> <S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S> Mary<S>3137</S> Magdalene<S>3094</S>, and<S>2532</S> Mary<S>3137</S> the mother<S>3384</S> of James<S>2385</S> the less<S>3398</S> and<S>2532</S> of Joses<S>2500</S>, and<S>2532</S> Salome<S>4539</S>;
(Who<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S>, when<S>3753</S> he was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> ministered<S>1247</S> unto him<S>846</S>;) and<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> other<S>243</S> women which<S>3588</S> came up<S>4872</S> with him<S>846</S> unto<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>.
And<S>2532</S> now<S>2235</S> when the even<S>3798</S> was come<S>1096</S>, because<S>1893</S> it was<S>2258</S> the preparation<S>3904</S>, that<S>3603</S> is<S>2076</S>, the day before the sabbath<S>4315</S>,
Joseph<S>2501</S> of<S>575</S> Arimathaea<S>707</S>, an honourable<S>2158</S> counsellor<S>1010</S>, which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> <S>846</S> waited<S>4327</S> for<S>2258</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>, came<S>2064</S>, and went in<S>1525</S> boldly<S>5111</S> unto<S>4314</S> Pilate<S>4091</S>, and<S>2532</S> craved<S>154</S> the body<S>4983</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> marvelled<S>2296</S> if<S>1487</S> he were<S>2348</S> already<S>2235</S> dead<S>2348</S>: and<S>2532</S> calling<S>4341</S> unto him the centurion<S>2760</S>, he asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> whether<S>1487</S> he had been<S>599</S> any while<S>3819</S> dead<S>599</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he knew<S>1097</S> it of<S>575</S> the centurion<S>2760</S>, he gave<S>1433</S> the body<S>4983</S> to Joseph<S>2501</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he bought<S>59</S> fine linen<S>4616</S>, and<S>2532</S> took him down<S>2507</S>, and wrapped<S>1750</S> him<S>846</S> in the linen<S>4616</S>, and<S>2532</S> laid<S>2698</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> a sepulchre<S>3419</S> which<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S> hewn<S>2998</S> out of<S>1537</S> a rock<S>4073</S>, and<S>2532</S> rolled<S>4351</S> a stone<S>3037</S> unto<S>1909</S> the door<S>2374</S> of the sepulchre<S>3419</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Mary<S>3137</S> Magdalene<S>3094</S> and<S>2532</S> Mary<S>3137</S> the mother of Joses<S>2500</S> beheld<S>2334</S> where<S>4226</S> he was laid<S>5087</S>.
